snippet: Detroit finished off the Anaheim Ducks with a 3-2 victory, and Toronto scored two third-period goals to send its series back to Boston for a decisive Game 7.
abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs beat Boston Bruins, 2-1, forcing Game 7 in their NHL playoff series.
lead_paragraph: Detroit finished off the Anaheim Ducks with a 3-2 victory, and Toronto scored two third-period goals to send its series back to Boston for a decisive Game 7.

headline.seo: Red Wings Win Game 7; Maple Leafs Force Another
headline.main: Red Wings Win Game 7; Maple Leafs Force Another
headline.print_headline: Red Wings Win Game 7; Maple Leafs Force Another
